inclusion.criterion: Ability participate in a three months follow-up program
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diastasis of the rectus abdominis muscles > 3 cm
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of neurologic, musculoskeletal or psychiatric disorders
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41-year-old obese woman with abdominal pain and vomiting. Lab studies show leukocytosis, urea, high CRP, high amylase, and Glucose level of 15.
